General.Name: Guangdong Ellington Electronics Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Ellington Electronics Technology Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells high-precision, high-density double-layer, and multi-layer printed circuit boards in China. Its products are used in automotive electronics, new energy and power supply, computer and communication, industrial control medical treatment, multimedia and display, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Ellington Co., Ltd and changed its name to Guangdong Ellington Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. in November 2007. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhongshan, China.
